about.title: Hi, I'm Stella.
about.description: I'm a freelance developer passionate about building small products that bring warmth and relaxation. Currently, I'm working on a web app focused on practicing English speaking skills. Let's learn and grow together if you share the the same passion!

services.title: Landing Page
services.description: 可愛風格的網頁設計、UI/UX設計等等！
services.description2: 實作前端網站、使用者友善體驗！
